attributes.additional_details: Please could the Governmentt intervene &  save the proposed scrapping of QE2. This Liner is British Built, named by and after our Monarch, has been used as a troop Ship for the Falklands Campaign, and has carried 1000's of very emminent passengers from around the world. It should be berthed in the UK and used as an attraction for visitors from the UK and around the world and as an Educational and Historic Venue. Please would the Government either launch an appeal to raise the funds to save this ship or allow for funds to be allocated to bring her "Home"
